label: AB3C4_tI16_121_a_bd_i-001
title: Luzonite (Cu$_{3}$AsS$_{4}$) Structure
comments:
The sample studied by (Marumo, 1967) had composition Cu$_{3}$[As$_{0.685}$Sb$_{0.315}$]S$_{4}$. 
 Cu$_{3}$AsS$_{4}$ can also be found as orthorhombic \href{current_web_home_dir/AB3C4_oP16_31_a_ab_2ab-001}{enargite ($H2_{5}$)}. 
 this is the ternary form of \href{current_web_home_dir/A2BC4D_tI16_121_d_a_i_b-001}{stannite (Cu$_{2}$FeS$_{4}$Sn), $H2_{6}$)}.
